Actions.Name: Lightning Gallop
Actions.Description: Dash 2 with phasing. If this movement is in a straight line, increase to dash 4. When this dash finishes, deal 2 piercing damage to a foe in range 4.

Combo.Name: Spiral Horn
Combo.Effects: Create a volatile mote, a terrain effect, next to every character in the line. When the Bicorn passes through a mote, it picks it up and increases the hit and miss damage of this ability by +2 permanently. (so picking up one would make it do [D]+2, twice, and 3 damage, twice on a miss, for example).

Actions.Name: Destabilize
Actions.Description: A foe in range becomes vulnerable. If that foe moves more than 1 space on its next turn, it also takes 2 damage twice.

Actions.Name: Surge Shift
Actions.Description: Remove the [name] or an ally anywhere from the battlefield, then place the [name] or that ally in range 2 of its original location.
